name: Space Adventure | 2D Shooter
description:
This is my 2D Shooter Project I made while completing Game Design and Development 1: 2D Shooter on Coursera.

You can use W, A, S, D or arrow keys to move and Space button or LMB to shoot. 

There are 4 levels:

Level 1 - Destroy all your enemies.

Level 2 - Find all hidden space stations and destroy them.

Level 3 - Stop the invasion.

Bonus Level 4 - Beat your high score.

Hope you enjoy this game and have fun :)
